attributes.action: A law for stolen valor & the falsely wearing of military uniform by fraudsters.
attributes.additional_details: The new law would prevent milatry fraudsters from stealing the valor of those who lay down their life's and have earned the right to wear the medals they have been awarded. The uniform ban on profitable actively will prevent all milatry charity scams from using fraud by deception as a key to their scam on the generous public.
attributes.background: The U.K. requires a law in place to stop fraudsters from wearing military medals they have not earned. The law must also include the ban on wearing military uniforms to seek financial profits through business or charity activity when they are not serving personnel of the unit.

rejection.details: If you want the UK Government and Parliament to criminalise the act of impersonating serving military personnel or veterans, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/165040
